tool.name: Roary query_pan_genome
tool.description: Perform set operations on the pan genome to see the gene differences between groups of isolates.
tool.command:
#set $filenames = list() #for $gff in $gff_input.gffs cp '$gff' '${gff.element_identifier}.gff' && #set $filename = str($gff.element_identifier) + '.gff' $filenames.append(str($filename)) #end for
query_pan_genome -g $clustered_proteins -a $actions.action #if str($actions.action) == 'gene_multifasta' -n $actions.gene_names #end if -c $pct -o output $verbose
#for $f in $filenames '$f' #end for

param.name: gff_input_selector
param.label: Individual gff files or a dataset collection
param.help: Select between individual gff files or a collection of gff files

param.name: gffs
param.label: select gff inputs to Roary
param.help: Select the files you wish to send to Roary, must be in gff3 format with the sequence data at the end of the file.

param.name: gffs
param.label: Dataset collection to submit to Roary
param.help: A dataset list collection of gff3 files to send to Roary for analysis.

param.name: gene_names
param.label: Comma separated list of gene names for use with gene_multifasta action

param.name: clustered_proteins
param.label: clustered_proteins
param.help: To have this file, you mush select output Clustered proteins file when running Roary

param.name: pct
param.label: Percentage of isolates a gene must be in to be core
